title: "Your Shop" today has deals for champions I have never played
body:
I'm an adc/mid player. I've never played Rakan, Nasus, Xin Zhao, or Braum in SR, and I haven't touched Orianna, Braum, or Rakan in ARAM anytime recently. I know the deals have been bugged in the past, so it seems like they're having problems again.

EDIT: They know of problems with "Your Shop" and are working on fixing them. Hopefully they're aware of this as well, since their descriptions of the problem are vague.

replies.body: I had bewitching tristana in my shop, I just hope I don't lose it tbh

As with the last "Your Shop" event, I believe Riot will honor any deals you received first if they end up re-loading the Shop.  You would just submit a ticket to support for it.  

That's how I got the manly man himself -  Santa Braum!  {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
how do i submit a ticket ?

Login at https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Then, in the top toolbar click "Submit a Request." 

Fill out all the relevant fields (they even have a 'topic' for Your Shop).

Click submit.   Hope this helps! :)

If you hover over the "Explore League" icon in the top left there will be a "Support" button you can click on.  It will redirect you to a different page.  If you click "Submit a Request" at the top it will let you send a ticket in to player support.
